This week, we'll go over the answer key for homework 1 and begin our discussion of demand estimation in the context of smoking.


### Objectives
- Understand how `R Markdown` creates a PDF file
- Explain some of the history of smoking in the U.S.
- Describe the empirical barriers to estimating demand curves

### Activities 
- Homework 1 review and discussion
- [Weekly check-in](/assignment/weekly-check-in.html) due on Friday
- [Homework 2](/assignment/homework2.html) due on Friday
- Begin working with CDC Tax Burden data
